message.entry: Since you set MotionModel to 'ConstantVelocity', the {0} must be a 2-element vector specifying the variance of location and the variance of velocity.
Since you set MotionModel to 'ConstantAcceleration', the {0} must be a 3-element vector specifying the variance of location, the variance of velocity, and the variance of acceleration.
Expected InitialEstimateError, MotionNoise, and MeasurementNoise to have the same class.
